definitions.definition: ( dated ) Of or relating to sugar ; sugary .
( dated ) Containing a large or excessive amount of sugar.
( figurative , derogatory ) Excessively sweet in action or disposition , especially if romantic or sentimental to the point of ridiculousness ; sickly sweet , syrupy .
( chiefly botany , geology ) Resembling granulated sugar; saccharoid .

main_definition: ( dated ) Of or relating to sugar ; sugary .
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) Containing a large or excessive amount of sugar.
( figurative , derogatory ) Excessively sweet in action or disposition , especially if romantic or sentimental to the point of ridiculousness ; sickly sweet , syrupy .
( chiefly botany , geology ) Resembling granulated sugar; saccharoid .

definitions.definition: Of or relating to saccharin ( “ a white , crystalline powder , C 7 H 5 NO 3 S, used as an artificial sweetener in food products ” ) .

main_definition: Of or relating to saccharin ( “ a white , crystalline powder , C 7 H 5 NO 3 S, used as an artificial sweetener in food products ” ) .
